item.title: Hundreds of women allege army medical abuse
item.description: The claims relate to checks carried out between the 1970s and 2010s at a number of locations.

item.title: Elderly woman found dead after being left on Great Barrier Reef island
item.description: The Coral Adventurer's crew realised the 80-year-old Australian was missing several hours after they had departed Lizard Island on the Great Barrier R...

item.title: Next continues to profit after M&S cyber-attack
item.description: Next is now expecting to report a pre-tax profit of just over £1.1bn at the end of January 2026.

item.title: Jamaicans wake to devastation - floods, power cuts and crippled communications
item.description: With communication networks in Jamaica crippled, the true scale of the disaster remains unknown.

item.title: David Attenborough backs bid to buy £30m estate for wildlife conservation
item.description: Wildlife trusts attempt to raise £30m to keep Northumberland's Rothbury Estate from being split up.
